::Prowl::

Prowl nods, something itching at the back of his mind. There was 
something he couldn't remember, something about a TF city a long long 
time ago. That was strange. Prowl could usually remember most things 
in his life, yet he didn't think he was a Maximal during that memory. 
He frowns, storing that thought on secondary datattracks to tend to 
it later.

"Hmm... Yes, I like the sound of that. Especially the wall. We can 
transfer all the CF defences onto it." Prowl turns his head to look 
at Epyon. "Are your ship's shields functional?"






--- In nbwrpg@y..., RoboRick007 <rfa007@h...> wrote:
> ::Epyon::
> 
> He didn't like being ignored, and walked with Prowl.
> "You are right. Maybe we can merge them here. There is enough of the
> StarJumper to turn this into a battle city. We could use the CF as 
the
> main part. Then we could build complexes around that. And surrond 
all
> that will heavy weapons, and probably a wall."
> 
> ::Hot Rod::
> 
> He followed Prowl, and Epyon. He liked this idea.
> "Prowl, this sounds good."
